alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 10:39PM CDT until April 22 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Cheyenne County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Eastern Morrill County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 1015 PM MDT. * At 938 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Lisco to 6 miles northwest of Sedgwick, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management and surface observations. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Lodgepole and Sunol. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 69 and 76. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
